import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; function AboutPage() { const [flippedCards, setFlippedCards] = useState({ about: false, usage: false, creator: false, tech: false }); const [hoveredCard, setHoveredCard] = useState(null); const [isDealing, setIsDealing] = useState(true); const toggleCard = (card) => { setFlippedCards(prev => ({ ...prev, [card]: !prev[card] })); }; useEffect(() => { // Deal animation on mount const timer = setTimeout(() => setIsDealing(false), 1500); return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return (

FLASHQUIZ The Card Magic of Learning

toggleCard('about')} onMouseEnter={() => setHoveredCard('about')} onMouseLeave={() => setHoveredCard(null)} style={{ '--deal-delay': '0.1s' }} >

What is FlashQuiz?

?

FlashQuiz transforms learning into an elegant performance. Create, study, and master knowledge with our card-based memory system designed for peak cognitive performance.

FQ
toggleCard('usage')} onMouseEnter={() => setHoveredCard('usage')} onMouseLeave={() => setHoveredCard(null)} style={{ '--deal-delay': '0.3s' }} >

How to Use

✧
  • Create custom question-answer pairs
  • Study with spaced repetition
  • Track your mastery levels
  • Secure local storage

No accounts • No ads • Pure learning magic

); } export default AboutPage;
